about_the_game:
Jump, dash and slide your way around a strange world as a little robot, sent to collect samples to stop the spread of an All-Consuming Entity. It will be coming for you, and only your quick platforming skills will help you escape!

  • 90s-era platforming: Test your skills in a 1-hit-death-quick-respawn platforming adventure in which you must explore, collect... and escape

  • More levels than you can ever play: Control a procedural generator with both simple and advanced modes. Then share the seeds with your friends and see who does it better!
detailed_description:
Jump, dash and slide your way around a strange world as a little robot, sent to collect samples to stop the spread of an All-Consuming Entity. It will be coming for you, and only your quick platforming skills will help you escape!

  • 90s-era platforming: Test your skills in a 1-hit-death-quick-respawn platforming adventure in which you must explore, collect... and escape

  • More levels than you can ever play: Control a procedural generator with both simple and advanced modes. Then share the seeds with your friends and see who does it better!

name: ACE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support - Examples: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more - Examples: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support - Examples: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Can you find all of the geodes and escape a cosmic horror in this unique, stylized platformer world? Procedurally create a near infinite number of unique levels that you can share with the world.
